## ITileDecoder.decodeTile() method

Decode tile into transferrable geometry.

Decode raw tile data (encoded with datasource specific encoding) into transferrable representation of tile's geometry.

See \[\[DecodedTile\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
decodeTile(data: ArrayBufferLike | {}, tileKey: TileKey, projection: Projection, requestController?: RequestController): Promise<DecodedTile>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | ArrayBufferLike \| {} |  |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) |  |
|  projection | [Projection](./harp-geoutils.projection.md) |  |
|  requestController | [RequestController](./harp-datasource-protocol.requestcontroller.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[DecodedTile](./harp-datasource-protocol.decodedtile.md)<!-- -->&gt;
